synopsis.text:
Suneo, Nobita, Shizuka, Jyaian, and their beloved robotic cat, Doraemon, find themselves on an extraordinary adventure when they are transported to a distant planet teeming with intelligent animals. The group discovers that this enchanting world, connected to their own through a mystical pink mist, bears a striking resemblance to the magical gate Doraemon often employs.

On this planet, the friends encounter Chippo, an adventurous puppy with a burning desire to uncover the truth behind an ancient legend. According to the myth, the inhabitants of the animal planet once fled the moon to evade ravenous creatures. As the planet now faces a new threat, Nobita and his friends join forces with Chippo to unravel the secrets of a mysterious nebula and safeguard their newfound companions.

When Chippo's community comes under attack from a menacing group called Numiges, Nobita, Doraemon, and the others fearlessly return to the animal planet. United in their quest to protect Chippo's world, they embark on a thrilling journey filled with curiosity, camaraderie, and courage. Will they succeed in defending the animal planet and unveiling the truth behind its ancient legends? Join our heroes as they explore this captivating world and forge unforgettable friendships along the way.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
